name: Atlantic Clipper Overnight Tour
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure with the Atlantic Clipper Overnight Tour, the ultimate fun and social experience in the Whitsundays! This 2-day, 2-night sailing tour offers an unforgettable journey through the stunning Whitsunday Islands. Get ready to explore breathtaking spots like the Hill Inlet lookout and dive into some of the best scuba diving and snorkeling sites in the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park. With a lively crew, exciting water activities including waterslides, heated spas, and paddleboards, plus delicious meals and snacks, this tour promises an epic and memorable escape!
includes:
Meals & Snacks
21 air-conditioned cabins
5 heated showers
Scuba diving equipment
Snorkeling gear
Waterslides
Dive platform
highlights:
Largest sailing boat in the Whitsundays
Fun and social atmosphere
Stunning views of Hill Inlet lookout
Diving and snorkeling at Great Barrier Reef Marine Park
Unique water activities

name: New Horizon Overnight Tour
description: Embark on the New Horizon Overnight Tour, the best value adventure in the Whitsundays! Perfect for solo travelers, groups, or couples, this fun and adventurous trip offers days of cruising through beautiful islands. Enjoy freshly prepared meals on board, with endless opportunities for snorkeling, swimming, and soaking up tropical rays. Experience the breathtaking beauty of the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park, explore Hill Inlet lookout, and revel in stunning sunsets. New Horizon is the perfect vessel for budget-friendly travel with all the modern comforts and thrills, including an inflatable waterslide and scuba diving on the best-equipped dive boat in the Whitsundays!
includes:
Meals & Snacks
Air-conditioned cabins
Heated showers
Scuba diving equipment
Snorkeling equipment
Dive platform
Master Reef Guide
BYO alcohol and drinks
highlights:
Cruising through the Whitsunday Islands
Great Barrier Reef Marine Park
Hill Inlet lookout
Inflatable waterslide
Freshly prepared meals
Scuba diving
Snorkeling
